name: Familiar (itch) (NocaToca)
description:
Currently still in development!

Made with Evan Binder

The main point of the game is to explore an open world while recollecting a story about a distant friend. I mostly made this as a starting point for a future project. I love creating enviroments though, and that was one of my focuses!

You can traverse through the spirit world to see memories, which is shown above, or traverse through the normal world to look at the environment!



Memories come in two forms: short memories, which can appear anywhere or meaningful memories which only appear by large cherry blossoms like this one.



You can press T to transfer between worlds and E to interact with memories.

Hope you have fun exploring!
As an explanation, this game was made for my Game Design 2 Final.

Music Credits:
Michael FK - Immersion
Michael FK - Falling Stars

ZaazNG - Raindrops
